roleset.name: split into periods, assign to a period

role.descr: thing split into periods or assigned to a period

example.name: periodize-v
example.text: Well, to answer the second question first, from 1913 we start to periodize history by decades.

example.name: periodizing-n
example.text: Thus, despite the superficial similarity in their periodizing or mythologizing of transformational moments in LEGO history...
